text:
The preview portion of the TinyMCE image insert window doesn't display a preview
of the image. There is an issue with how the src attribute of the img tag is
setup. The patch copies the usage of the version of the file from FCKeditor,
which does work as expected.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19019
Fixes img src to display previews
